titles: A letter to Dr. Fowler vicar of St. Giles Cripplegate in answer to his late vindicatory preface by William Newbery & William Edmvnds.
author: Newbery, William.
Edmunds, William.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714. --  Great wickedness and mischievous effects of slandering ... in a sermon ... with a preface ... in his own vindication.
